xmlns:i="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/SolarWinds.Reporting.Models.Selection">_x000D_linebreak <CommandText>select 'Status' as [c], concat('ampersandlt;img src="/Orion/images/StatusIcons/Small-',StatusLED,'"ampersandgt;ampersandlt;/ampersandgt; '_x000D_linebreak,'ampersandlt;a href="/Orion/View.aspx?View=NodeDetailsampersandamp;NetObject=N:',cast(NodeID as varchar),'"ampersandgt;'_x000D_linebreak,StatusDescription_x000D_linebreak,case when sup.SuppressFrom ampersandlt; GETUTCDATE() and sup.SuppressUntil ampersandgt; GETUTCDATE() then ('ampersandlt;brampersandgt;Node is Muted from '+cast(sup.SuppressFrom as varchar)+' until '+cast(sup.suppressuntil as varchar)+'. ')_x000D_linebreakwhen sup.SuppressFrom ampersandlt; GETUTCDATE() and sup.suppressuntil is null then ('ampersandlt;brampersandgt;Node is Muted from '+cast(sup.SuppressFrom as varchar)+' until Forever. ')_x000D_linebreakelse ''_x000D_linebreakend_x000D_linebreak,'ampersandlt;/ampersandgt;') AS [v] _x000D_linebreakfrom nodes n_x000D_linebreakleft join AlertSuppression2 sup on sup.EntityUri= ('swis://WPOH0019SWPOL01.cardinalhealth.net/Orion/Orion.Nodes/NodeID='+cast(n.nodeid as varchar))_x000D_linebreakwhere nodeid=${nodeid} _x000D_linebreak _x000D_linebreakunion all (select 'IP Address' as [c], concat('ampersandlt;a href="/Orion/View.aspx?View=NodeDetailsampersandamp;NetObject=N:',cast(NodeID as varchar),'"ampersandgt;',IP_Address,'ampersandlt;/ampersandgt;') AS [v] from nodes where nodeid=${nodeid}) _x000D_linebreak _x000D_linebreakunion ALL (select 'Machine Type' as [c], concat('ampersandlt;img src="/NetPerfMon/Images/Vendors/',VendorIcon,'"ampersandgt;ampersandlt;/ampersandgt; ','ampersandlt;a href="/Orion/View.aspx?View=NodeDetailsampersandamp;NetObject=N:',cast(NodeID as varchar),'"ampersandgt;',vendor,' - ',machinetype,'ampersandlt;/ampersandgt;') AS [v] from nodes where nodeid=${nodeid}) _x000D_linebreak _x000D_linebreakunion ALL (select 'DNS' as [c],dns as [v] from nodes where nodeid=${nodeid}) _x000D_linebreak _x000D_linebreakunion ALL (select 'System Name' as [c], sysname as [v] from nodes where nodeid=${nodeid}) _x000D_linebreak _x000D_linebreakunion ALL (select 'Last Boot' as [c], cast(lastboot as varchar) as [v] from nodes where nodeid=${nodeid}) _x000D_linebreak _x000D_linebreakunion ALL (select 'Description' as [c], Description as [v] from nodes where nodeid=${nodeid}) _x000D_linebreak_x000D_linebreakunion ALL (select 'Location' as [c], Location as [v] from nodes where nodeid=${nodeid}) _x000D_linebreak_x000D_linebreakunion ALL (select 'Contact' as [c], Contact as [v] from nodes where nodeid=${nodeid}) _x000D_linebreak _x000D_linebreakunion all (select 'CPU' as [c], case when CPULoad ampersandlt; 0 then 'N/A' else cast(isnull(CPUCount,1) as varchar) + ' (' + cast(CPULoad as varchar) +'% Load)' end as [v] from nodes c where c.nodeid=${nodeid}) _x000D_linebreak _x000D_linebreakunion all (select 'MEM' as [c], _x000D_linebreakcase when PercentMemoryUsed ampersandlt;0 then 'N/A' else _x000D_linebreakconcat(case when TotalMemory/1024/1024/1024ampersandgt;1 then cast(round(TotalMemory/1024/1024/1024,2) as varchar)+' GB' _x000D_linebreakwhen TotalMemory/1024/1024ampersandgt;1 then cast(round(TotalMemory/1024/1024,2) as varchar)+' MB' _x000D_linebreak when TotalMemory/1024ampersandgt;1 then cast(round(TotalMemory/1024,2) as varchar)+' KB' _x000D_linebreak else cast(TotalMemory as varchar)+' B' end, _x000D_linebreak' (', cast(PercentMemoryUsed as varchar) ,'% Used)') end as [v] from nodes where nodeid=${nodeid}) _x000D_linebreak_x000D_linebreakunion all (SELECT 'Hardware' as [c], (select case when vim.HostID is null then 'Physical' else 'Virtual' end as [v] FROM Nodes n left outer join VIM_VirtualMachines vim on vim.IPAddress=n.IP_Address where n.nodeid=${nodeid})) _x000D_linebreak_x000D_linebreakunion all (_x000D_linebreakselect 'Web Browse' as [c]_x000D_linebreak, 'ampersandlt;a href="'+replace(settingvalue,'',ip_address)+'"ampersandgt;'+replace(settingvalue,'',ip_address)+'ampersandlt;/aampersandgt;' as v_x000D_linebreak from nodesettings ns_x000D_linebreakjoin nodes n on n.nodeid=ns.nodeid_x000D_linebreakwhere ns.settingname = 'Core.WebBrowseTemplate'_x000D_linebreakand n.nodeid=${nodeid}) _x000D_linebreak_x000D_linebreakunion all (select 'SSH' as [c], 'ampersandlt;a href="SSH://'+ip_address+'"ampersandgt;'+'SSH://'+ip_address+'ampersandlt;/aampersandgt;' as v from nodes where nodeid=${nodeid}) _x000D_linebreak _x000D_linebreakunion all ( _x000D_linebreakselect 'Polling' as [c]_x000D_linebreak, case when n.ObjectSubType = 'WMI' then 'WMI: '+(Select distinct c.Name from Credential c inner join NodeSettings ns on c.ID=ns.SettingValue inner join Nodes nn on ns.NodeID=n.NodeID where ns.SettingName ='WMICredential' and ns.nodeid =n.nodeid) _x000D_linebreakwhen n.ObjectSubType ='SNMP' and n.SNMPVersion=3 then 'SNMPv3: '+(SELECT c.Name FROM NodeSettings ns join Credential c on c.ID=ns.SettingValue where ns.NodeID=n.nodeid and (ns.settingname like '%snmp%')) _x000D_linebreakwhen n.ObjectSubType = 'SNMP' and n.SNMPVersion in (1,2) then 'SNMPv'+cast(n.snmpversion as varchar)+': '+n.Community collate SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS _x000D_linebreakwhen n.ObjectSubType = 'ICMP' then 'ICMP' _x000D_linebreakwhen n.ObjectSubType = 'Agent' then 'Agent' _x000D_linebreakelse 'Unknown' end as [v]_x000D_linebreakfrom nodes n _x000D_linebreakwhere nodeid=${nodeid} ) _x000D_linebreak_x000D_linebreakunion all ( select 'Polling Engine' as [c] , e.servername as [v] from nodes n join engines e on e.engineid = n.engineid where n.nodeid=${nodeid} ) _x000D_linebreak_x000D_linebreakunion all ( select 'Last Polled' as [c] _x000D_linebreak,concat('ampersandlt;img src="/Orion/images/StatusIcons/Small-'_x000D_linebreak, case when n.LastSystemUpTimePollUtc ampersandlt; dateadd(minute,-60,getutcdate()) then 'critical' else 'up' end,'.gif"ampersandgt;ampersandlt;/ampersandgt; '_x000D_linebreak,cast(isnull(dateadd(hh,datediff(hh,getutcdate(),getdate()), n.LastSystemUpTimePollUtc),0) as nvarchar)) as [v] _x000D_linebreakfrom nodes n_x000D_linebreakwhere n.nodeid=${nodeid} ) _x000D_linebreak_x000D_linebreakunion all ( select 'Polling Interval' as [c] , concat(cast(PollInterval as nvarchar),' seconds') as [v] from nodes n where n.nodeid=${nodeid} ) _x000D_linebreak_x000D_linebreakunion all ( select 'Statistics Interval' as [c] , concat(cast(StatCollection as nvarchar),' minutes') as [v] from nodes n where n.nodeid=${nodeid} )_x000D_linebreak_x000D_linebreakunion all ( select 'Rediscovery Interval' as [c] , concat(cast(RediscoveryInterval as nvarchar),' minutes') as [v] from nodes n where n.nodeid=${nodeid} )_x000D_linebreak_x000D_linebreakunion all (_x000D_linebreakselect top 1 'ampersandlt;img src="/Orion/Images/SubViewIcons/DPASubView.png"ampersandgt;' as [c] _x000D_linebreak, ' Alerting Thresholds' as [v] _x000D_linebreakfrom nodes n _x000D_linebreak_x000D_linebreakunion all (_x000D_linebreakselect ' - ampersandlt;img src="/Orion/images/TopologyItems/RArrow2.png"ampersandgt;' as [c] _x000D_linebreak, concat(replace(nt.Name,'Nodes.Stats.',''), case_x000D_linebreakwhen nt.thresholdoperator = 0 then ' ampersandgt; '_x000D_linebreakwhen nt.thresholdoperator = 1 then ' ampersandgt;= '_x000D_linebreakwhen nt.thresholdoperator = 2 then ' = '_x000D_linebreakwhen nt.thresholdoperator = 3 then ' ampersandlt;= '_x000D_linebreakwhen nt.thresholdoperator = 4 then ' ampersandlt; '_x000D_linebreakwhen nt.thresholdoperator = 5 then ' != '_x000D_linebreakend_x000D_linebreak, nt.Level2Value_x000D_linebreak, case when nt.name in ('Nodes.Stats.ResponseTime') then ' ms' else ' %' end_x000D_linebreak, ' for '_x000D_linebreak, nt.CriticalPolls_x000D_linebreak, ' of '_x000D_linebreak, nt.CriticalPollsInterval_x000D_linebreak, ' polls'_x000D_linebreak, case when nt.ThresholdType = 1 then ' (Custom)' end_x000D_linebreak) _x000D_linebreak_x000D_linebreakas [v] _x000D_linebreak_x000D_linebreakfrom nodesThresholds nt _x000D_linebreakwhere nt.InstanceId=${nodeid}_x000D_linebreakand nt.CriticalEnabled = 1_x000D_linebreak)_x000D_linebreak_x000D_linebreak--interfaces_x000D_linebreakunion all (_x000D_linebreakselect top 1 'ampersandlt;img src="/Orion/Images/SubViewIcons/Interfaces.png"ampersandgt;' as [c] _x000D_linebreak, ' Interface Thresholds' as [v] _x000D_linebreakfrom interfaces i _x000D_linebreakwhere i.nodeid=${nodeid}_x000D_linebreakunion all (_x000D_linebreakselect distinct _x000D_linebreak' - ampersandlt;img src="/Orion/images/TopologyItems/RArrow2.png"ampersandgt;' as [c] _x000D_linebreak, concat(case when it.ThresholdType = 1 then i.caption else 'Standard Interfaces' end, replace(it.Name,'NPM.Interfaces.Stats.',' - ')_x000D_linebreak,case_x000D_linebreakwhen it.thresholdoperator = 0 then ' ampersandgt; '_x000D_linebreakwhen it.thresholdoperator = 1 then ' ampersandgt;= '_x000D_linebreakwhen it.thresholdoperator = 2 then ' = '_x000D_linebreakwhen it.thresholdoperator = 3 then ' ampersandlt;= '_x000D_linebreakwhen it.thresholdoperator = 4 then ' ampersandlt; '_x000D_linebreakwhen it.thresholdoperator = 5 then ' != '_x000D_linebreakend_x000D_linebreak, it.Level2Value_x000D_linebreak, case when it.name like ('%error%') then ' errors' else ' %' end_x000D_linebreak, case when it.ThresholdType = 1 then ' (Custom)' end_x000D_linebreak) _x000D_linebreak_x000D_linebreakas [v] _x000D_linebreak_x000D_linebreakfrom interfaces i_x000D_linebreakjoin interfacesthresholds it on i.InterfaceID=it.InstanceId_x000D_linebreakwhere i.nodeid=${nodeid}_x000D_linebreak_x000D_linebreak)_x000D_linebreak_x000D_linebreak)_x000D_linebreak_x000D_linebreak--volumes_x000D_linebreakunion all (_x000D_linebreakselect top 1 'ampersandlt;img src="/Orion/Images/SubViewIcons/Storage02.png"ampersandgt;' as [c] _x000D_linebreak, ' Volume Thresholds' as [v] _x000D_linebreakfrom volumes v _x000D_linebreakwhere v.nodeid=${nodeid}_x000D_linebreakunion all (_x000D_linebreakselect distinct_x000D_linebreak' - ampersandlt;img src="/Orion/images/TopologyItems/RArrow2.png"ampersandgt;' as [c]_x000D_linebreak, concat(case _x000D_linebreakwhen fc.criticalthreshold is not null or v.v_MinimumGB is not null then v.caption _x000D_linebreakelse 'Standard Volumes' end,_x000D_linebreakcase when v.v_MinimumGB is not null then (concat(' ampersandlt; ',v.v_MinimumGB,' GB (Custom)'))_x000D_linebreakwhen fc.criticalthreshold is not null then (concat(' ampersandgt; ',fc.criticalthreshold,' % (Custom)')) _x000D_linebreakelse (concat(' ampersandgt; ',gcrit.crit,' % (Default)')) end) as [v]_x000D_linebreak_x000D_linebreakfrom volumes v_x000D_linebreakcross join (Select CurrentValue AS crit FROM Settings WHERE SettingID = 'NetPerfMon-DiskSpace-Error') gcrit_x000D_linebreakleft join ForecastCapacitySettings fc on fc.InstanceId=v.VolumeID and fc.MetricId = 3_x000D_linebreakwhere v.nodeid=${nodeid}_x000D_linebreak)_x000D_linebreak)_x000D_linebreak)_x000D_linebreak_x000D_linebreak</CommandText>_x000D_linebreak
